quote: I have a couple of favorite relatives, but because they're so far away I tend to ignore them-even though they have mailboxes, email addresses and telephone numbers. Today, I'll get back in touch.
quote_letters: I HAVE A COUPLE OF FAVORITE RELATIVES BUT BECAUSE THEYRE SO FAR AWAY I TEND TO IGNORE THEM-EVEN THOUGH THEY HAVE MAILBOXES EMAIL ADDRESSES AND TELEPHONE NUMBERS TODAY ILL GET BACK IN TOUCH
